entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who is being forced to drink a potion. He is described as 'Professor' by Harry, indicating his position of authority.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is forcing Dumbledore to drink the potion. He is described as having a 'hand shaking', indicating that he is nervous or upset.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is being forced to drink the potion by Harry. This relationship is described in the text as 'Harry forced the goblet back towards Dumbledore's mouth and tipped it, so that Dumbledore drank the remainder of the potion inside.'
